name: Block fight 2
description:
A remake of my first ever game called Block fight! This time you do not have to download it and go onto scratch to play!

WASD to move, x twice to go to menu.

Goal is to kill enemies by touching them, on menu press reset kills to reset your kills, kills are shown in the top left.

To reset all positions press r.

For enemies to respawn wait 5 seconds after their death.
